name: RMS OF GEORGIA, LLC D/B/A CHOICE REFRIGERANTS
description: Developer and wholesaler of environmentally-friendly refrigerants.
sampleDescriptions: Enforcement and interpretation of Department of Commerce antidumping duty orders.  Implementation of Department of Commerce Section 301 tariffs and Section 301 tariff exclusion requests.
